body_html:
I think it would be nice for tensor.scatter_add_ to support the following (like in @vadimkantorov 's original issue):

  • broadcasting of src because it's common for people to just want to scatter one value
  • scalar src argument

While there are workarounds, I think that having the above two features would improve usability

body:
I think it would be nice for `tensor.scatter_add_` to support the following (like in @vadimkantorov 's original issue):
- broadcasting of `src` because it's common for people to just want to scatter one value
- scalar src argument

While there are workarounds, I think that having the above two features would improve usability
